product_name: Maui Jim Kuiaha Bay Polarized Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: The women's Maui Jim Kuiaha Bay Polarized Sunglasses offer a touch of paradise, delivering attractive frames, crisp optics and PolarizedPlus(R)2 lens technology. PolarizedPlus2 lenses eliminate 99.9% of glare; patented multilayer design and lens treatment maximize color transmission and enhance visible color. Waterproof, anti-oil coating sheds water and repels grease and smudges. Midnight Black frames feature Neutral Grey lenses for especially bright, direct sunlight; they offer rich color and contrast along with very high light production. Rootbeer Blue frames feature HCL (High Contrast Lens) Bronze lenses for added contrast on overcast or foggy days; subtle bronze tint is ideal for variable sunlight. With a center thickness of 1.8mm, ST (SuperThin) glass lenses are 20% thinner and lighter than standard laminated glass lenses for long-wearing comfort. Anti-corrosive spring hinge; embedded rubber nose pads. Refined rectangle frame shape complements round or oval face shapes and best fits small faces. The Maui Jim Kuiaha Bay Polarized Sunglasses come with a case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: The women's Maui Jim Kuiaha Bay Polarized Sunglasses offer a touch of paradise, delivering attractive frames, crisp optics and PolarizedPlus(R)2 lens technology.
